00020 void pcan_transmit::hlpMsg()
00021 {
00028         printf("pcan_transmit - a small node, based on transmitest , which is subscribed to a ROS topic and sends CAN messages.\n");
00029         printf("usage:   can_transmit { | [-b=BTR0BTR1]  [-?]\n");
00030         printf("                -b - BTR0BTR1 code in hex, e.g.\n");
00031         printf("                0x0014  =   1 MBit/s\n");
00032         printf("                0x001C  = 500 kBit/s\n");
00033         printf("                0x011C  = 250 kBit/s\n");
00034         printf("                0x031C  = 125 kBit/s\n");
00035         printf("                0x432F  = 100 kBit/s\n");
00036         printf("                0x472F  =  50 kBit/s\n");
00037         printf("                0x532F  =  20 kBit/s\n");
00038         printf("                0x672F  =  10 kBit/s\n");
00039         printf("                0x7F7F  =   5 kBit/s\n");
00040         printf("                (default: 1 Mbit).\n");
00041         printf("                -? or --help - this help\n");
00042         printf("\n");
00043 }

00048 pcan_transmit::pcan_transmit()
00049 {
00056   //Initialisation
00057   nType = HW_PCI;
00058   dwPort = 0;
00059   wIrq = 0;
00060   // parameter wBTR0BTR1
00061   // bitrate codes of BTR0/BTR1 registers
00062   //#define CAN_BAUD_1M     0x0014  //   1 MBit/s
00063   //#define CAN_BAUD_500K   0x001C  // 500 kBit/s
00064   //#define CAN_BAUD_250K   0x011C  // 250 kBit/s
00065   //#define CAN_BAUD_125K   0x031C  // 125 kBit/s

00068   //#define CAN_BAUD_20K    0x532F  //  20 kBit/s

00070   //#define CAN_BAUD_5K     0x7F7F  //   5 kBit/s
00071   wBTR0BTR1 = 0x0014;
00072   nExtended = CAN_INIT_TYPE_ST;
00073   szDevNode = DEFAULT_NODE;
00074   bDevNodeGiven = false;
00075   bTypeGiven    = false;
00076   errno = 0;
00077   pcan_sub = n.subscribe("pcan_transmitted", 1, &pcan_transmit::transmit, this);
00078 }

00080 void pcan_transmit::init(int argc, char **argv)
00081 {
00089         // decode command line arguments
00090                 for (i = 1; i < argc; i++)
00091                 {
00092                     char c;
00093 
00094                     ptr = argv[i];
00095 
00096                     while (*ptr == '-')
00097                       ptr++;
00098 
00099                     c = *ptr;
00100                     ptr++;
00101 
00102                     if (*ptr == '=')
00103                       ptr++;
00104 
00105                     switch(tolower(c))
00106                     {
00107                       case '?':
00108                       case 'h':
00109                         hlpMsg();
00110                         do_exit(errno);
00111                         break;
00112                       case 'b':
00113                         wBTR0BTR1 = (__u16)strtoul(ptr, NULL, 16);
00114                         break;
00115                       default:
00116                          errno = EINVAL;
00117                          do_exit(errno);;
00118                         break;
00119                     }
00120                 }
00121                   /* open CAN port */
00122                    if ((bDevNodeGiven) || (!bDevNodeGiven && !bTypeGiven))
00123                    {
00124                      h = LINUX_CAN_Open(szDevNode, O_RDWR);
00125                      if (!h)
00126                      {
00127                        printf("pcan_transmit: can't open %s\n", szDevNode);
00128                        do_exit(errno);;
00129                      }
00130                    }
00131                    else {
00132                      // please use what is appropriate
00133                      // HW_DONGLE_SJA
00134                      // HW_DONGLE_SJA_EPP
00135                      // HW_ISA_SJA
00136                      // HW_PCI
00137                      h = CAN_Open(nType, dwPort, wIrq);
00138                      if (!h)
00139                      {
00140                        printf("pcan_transmit: can't open %s device.\n", getNameOfInterface(nType));
00141                        do_exit(errno);;
00142                      }
00143                    }
00144                    /* clear status */
00145                      CAN_Status(h);
00146                      // get version info
00147                      errno = CAN_VersionInfo(h, txt);
00148                      if (!errno)
00149                        printf("pcan_transmit: driver version = %s\n", txt);
00150                      else {
00151                        perror("pcan_transmit: CAN_VersionInfo()");
00152                        do_exit(errno);;
00153                      }
00154                      // init to a user defined bit rate
00155                      if (wBTR0BTR1)
00156                      {
00157                        errno = CAN_Init(h, wBTR0BTR1, nExtended);
00158                        if (errno)
00159                        {
00160                          perror("pcan_transmit: CAN_Init()");
00161                          do_exit(errno);;
00162                        }
00163                      }
00164 
00165 }
00166 TPCANMsg pcan_transmit::StringToTPCANRdMsg(std_msgs::String msg)
00167 {
00175         TPCANMsg m;
00176         std::string can_message = msg.data;
00177         std::stringstream ss;
00178         std::istringstream iss(can_message);
00179         std::vector<std::string> tokens;
00180         std::copy(std::istream_iterator<std::string>(iss), std::istream_iterator<std::string>(), std::back_inserter<std::vector<std::string> >(tokens));
00181         if(tokens.size()>2)
00182         {
00183                 m.ID = (DWORD) std::strtol(tokens.at(0).data(),NULL,0);
00184                 m.LEN = (BYTE) std::strtol(tokens.at(1).data(),NULL,0);
00185         }
00186         if(tokens.size()>3 && tokens.size()<11)
00187         {
00188                 for(int i = 2; i < tokens.size(); i++)
00189                 {
00190                         m.DATA[i-2] = (BYTE) std::strtol(tokens.at(i).data(),NULL,0);
00191                 }
00192 
00193         }
00194         return m;
00195 }

00198 void pcan_transmit::transmit(const std_msgs::String msg)
00199 {
00207         TPCANMsg m = StringToTPCANRdMsg(msg);
00208 
00209         //send the message
00210         //CheckTPCANMsg(m) &&
00211         if (  CAN_Write(h, &m))
00212         {
00213                 perror("pcan_transmit: CAN_Write()");
00214         }
00215 }
